about_the_game:
In the sacred lands of Athens, Something has been changed
and somehow you can feel the tension.
The power of darkness is rising.
You must survive against the mightiest gods in history.
You have to be ready for everything in this adventure where
you will not have any time to catch your breath.
But you never know what fate will bring you.






  • Uncover the secret of paranormal events in your life.
  • Regain your true identity and avoid enemy obstacles.
  • Everything you know is a lie. Just trust your instincts.
  • Remember your past and become stronger.
  • Crawl, run, hide... But survive.
  • In this world you either kill or die.
  • Find the sacred weapons and learn antique skills.



  • Reborn : Fate Of Gods is a first person psychological horror game.
  • With high quality graphics and sound design you can face the true
    horror experience for the first time.
  • Mix of stealth and Souls like gameplay.
  • Different story flow with becoming hunt to be hunter.

    Developed with the feedback of our valuable community.

name: Reborn : Fate Of Gods

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10 (64 bit)
  • Processor: 2.2 GHz Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2 GB
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10 (64 bit)
  • Processor: 2.8 GHz Quad Core CPU
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 4 GB
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible

short_description: Reborn is a first person psychological horror game. You have to survive from gods awakening and need to find out how to get more strength while you are surrounded with enemies.
supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Turkish
*languages with full audio support
